mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CMS_WECHATUSER( wechat_user_id, nickname, realname, avatar_url, openid, tel, usertype, age, workunit, userstatu, sys_user_id, create_date, update_date )VALUES( #{wechatUserId}, #{nickName}, #{realName}, #{avatarUrl}, #{openId}, #{tel}, #{userType}, #{age}, #{workUnit}, #{userStatu}, #{sysUserId}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate} )
mapper.select: SELECT wechat_user_id AS wechatUserId,nickname AS nickName,realname AS realName,avatar_url AS avatarUrl,tel,usertype AS userType,age,workunit AS workUnit,userstatu AS userStatu,sys_user_id AS sysUserId FROM CMS_WECHATUSER WHERE openid=#{openId}
mapper.update: UPDATE CMS_WECHATUSER SET userstatu=#{statu} WHERE wechat_user_id =#{wechatUserId}

mapper.select: SELECT handle_way AS handleWay FROM COMPLAINT_INFO LEFT JOIN CMS_WECHAT_COMPLAINT ON CMS_WECHAT_COMPLAINT.COMPLAINT_MAIN_ID=COMPLAINT_INFO.COMPLAINT_MAIN_ID WHERE CMS_WECHAT_COMPLAINT.WECHAT_USER_ID=#{wechatUserId}

SELECT count(*) FROM COMPLAINT_MAIN_DETAIL LEFT JOIN CMS_WECHATUSER ON CMS_WECHATUSER.sys_user_id=COMPLAINT_MAIN_DETAIL.create_by WHERE CMS_WECHATUSER.wechat_user_id=#{wechatUserId}

SELECT count(*) FROM MACHINE_ACCOUNT a LEFT JOIN SYS_USER b ON a.mediator_id=b.id LEFT JOIN COMPLAINT_MAIN c ON c.complaint_main_id=a.complaint_main_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT proc_inst_id_,act_name_ FROM ACT_HI_ACTINST WHERE act_type_='userTask' GROUP BY proc_inst_id_ ORDER BY start_time_ DESC) d ON c.PROC_INS_ID=d.PROC_INST_ID_ LEFT JOIN CMS_WECHATUSER e ON e.sys_user_id=a.MEDIATOR_ID LEFT JOIN COMPLAINT_MAIN_DETAIL f ON f.complaint_main_id=a.complaint_main_id LEFT JOIN SYS_OFFICE g ON g.id=a.hospital_id WHERE e.wechat_user_id=#{wechatUserId} AND (d.act_name_='评估鉴定' OR d.act_name_='达成调解' OR d.act_name_='签署协议' OR d.act_name_='履行协议' )
